TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ControlSkinDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ControlSkinDelegate(control As Control) As Control
type ControlSkinDelegate = delegate of Control -> Control

Docs.param: The to which to apply the theme skin.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that applies the correct control skin to the specified control.
Docs.returns: The that was passed to the method, with a control skin applied.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes directly. These classes are used internally by the ASP.NET page framework to apply server- side properties and cascading style sheet definitions that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skin files to specific types of controls.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate> delegate is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin.ApplySkin%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin> class. The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin> class represents an ASP.NET control skin, which is a component of an ASP.NET theme represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> object. For more information about ASP.NET themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
